full_text: The council will be reopening Seapoint bathing area and the coastal path to the West Pier today, with Sandycove and the Forty Foot bathing areas reopening on Wednesday.  For more details on what's happening in Phase 1, click here: https://t.co/2sIAvWC5dd https://t.co/hs1k11Qovq

we can't have a situation where essential childcare for healthcare workers or for others is dependent on what private insurance companies are willing to cover, we need the state to step in, there needs to be a national childcare service and it needs to be insured by the state. https://t.co/QgBeo634sI

Asked CMO why we have high infection rate in  healthcare workers. 31% here, 15% in Spain/Italy. No answer, nor to more general question re testing regime for healthcare workers.  We need to see the advice that #NPHET are receiving. Have been asking for this since 16/03. #COVID19

from 200 complaints about lack of physical distancing in work places currently working, not one inspection took place.  we need the HSA to take a proactive role in inspecting workplaces to make sure workers are safe. https://t.co/8PMFMgJCgw

Attending Covid Cttee for PBP today. Will be questioning CMO/DoH/HSE. Also wrote on Fri to #Dáil business cttee for todays mtg saying we need more cttees to discuss all the urgent issues that  #Covid19Ireland has thrown up - mental health, public transport, job loss, poverty etc.
